name: Inazuma
startIntroPart1: Hail to you, your Excellency. The Narukami Ogosho, the God of Thunder and sovereign of Inazuma, Raiden Shogun. Inazuma is the Land of Eternity, whom you which have been protecting for far so long. However 500 years, the loss of Makoto, your twin sister had been a devastating loss to our nation. As a result, you forced yourself to isolate yourself from the eyes of people and ruled through the Raiden Shogun to which, ruled with an iron fist. However, thanks to the intervention of the Guuiji of the Grand Narukami Shrine and the Traveler, you were enlightened from the flaws of your rule and you made the wise choice of abolishing the Sakoku and Vision Hunt Decrees that done more harm than good for our path to Eternity.
startIntroPart2: Times are changing, and so too are the threats that plauge in and out of Inazuma, from barbarians to rising foreign empires. Your Excellency, the people of Inazuma needs a wise leader that can lead through these chaotic times. Can you build the dreams of Eternity that you and your sister dreamt of 500 years ago? Can you protect Inazuma from threats that plauge our divine nation? Can you build a civilization that can withstand the test of time?
declaringWar: You have obstructed my preservation of Eternity for far too long. For that, you shall pay dearly for your insolence!
attacked: Hmph, such insolent act. Very well, today, you shall learn to rue that you even dared to threaten the Eternity I have long been preserving.
defeated: I... have been defeated? Impossible, What shall become of Inazuma now that the Eternity I have been protecting shall now be gone?
introduction: I extend my greetings to you. In case you have yet heard, I, am the Raiden Shogun, the Archon of Electro and Sovereign of Inazuma. If you pose no desire to threaten Eternity, then I suppose we can be friends. However, should you dare of even thinking such act, then beware, for I shall punish you with my own blade.
hateHello: Speak, before I smite you down.
hateNo: You can flee while you can.
hateYes: You are wiser than what you look.
afterPeace: You proven your spirit as a warrior. For that, you have earned my respect.
tradeRequest: I believe this proposal can strongly benefit both of our people. Think wisely.
uniqueName: The Islands of Thunder and Eternity
uniqueText:
+1 Culture, +1 Faith in all non-occupied cities connected to the capital.
Faith and Culture increases by +1 everytime you enter a new era.
uniques: [+1 Culture, +1 Faith] [in all non-occupied cities] <in cities connected to the capital> <starting from the [Ancient era]>
[+1 Culture, +1 Faith] [in all non-occupied cities] <in cities connected to the capital> <starting from the [Classical era]>
[+1 Culture, +1 Faith] [in all non-occupied cities] <in cities connected to the capital> <starting from the [Medieval era]>
[+1 Culture, +1 Faith] [in all non-occupied cities] <in cities connected to the capital> <starting from the [Renaissance era]>
[+1 Culture, +1 Faith] [in all non-occupied cities] <in cities connected to the capital> <ustarting from the [Industrial era]>

name: Sumeru
startIntroPart1: Blessings be upon you Lesser Lord Kusanali, the God of Wisdom and the Dendro Archon. Sumeru was once but a barren desert in the heart of Teyvat, but under the guidance of [REDACTED], what was once a barren corner of land turned into a lush and lively forest, which later became the homeland of wisdom and knowledge. Though not all was well, the Sages, under the guidance of Grand Sage Azar and the backing of Il Dottore and the Fatui, Azar and 3 other Sages conspired to overthrow the rule on Sumeru that the late [REDACTED] entrusted to you and imprisoned you for 500 years. Fortunately, the Traveler and a group of loyal and patriotic Sumerians have saw their despicable plot and managed to free you and overthrow them along with their plans to create a false god through the [REDACTED]. Now that order has been restored, the dreams of [REDACTED] of you guiding Sumeru can finally be realized. It is now up to you to finally guide Sumeru into a new era, 500 years since her passing.
startIntroPart2: Though the memories of [REDACTED] was forever removed from the Irminsul, she believes, that you, as her sapling shall usher the Land of Wisdom into greatness, perhaps greater than what she could ever hope for. Can you protect the sacred forests that [REDACTED] nourished? Can you fulfill her greatest wish? Can you build a civilization that can withstand the test of time?
declaringWar: I, for so long have understood that violence can't always resolve problems, but this isn't the case for this instance.
attacked: I know for some time already that you're harboring such thoughts against me. For that, I have a surprise already waiting just for you...
defeated: I don't understand... where did I go wrong? I always wished we could be friends and prosper together, but... life... can be cruel...
introduction: Nice to meet you! Hehe, I've actually been watching you for a long time already. My name's Nahida. I might look like a child, but don't be fooled: I understand this world much better than any grown-up. So... I heard so much about you, do you want to share your story about how you rule your nation? Oh I know! How about we talk about our dreams and hope for the people of this world?
neutralHello: Hello! It's been a long time! What can I do for you?
neutralLetsHearIt: Is there something I can do for you?
neutralNo: Umm... that's a bit too much to ask.
Uhh... maybe, give it some thought?
hateLetsHearIt: What do you have in mind?
hateNo: I cannot say I would agree to it
Maybe you have something else to offer?
hateYes: Alright, we can agree to it.
afterPeace: 'The best way to destroy an enemy is to make him a friend..' I hope one day, both of us can reach this same conclusion.
tradeRequest: They say that: 'Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.' For that, I wanted to share this deal with you, I hope you accept.
